sentences.en: A blast of wind blew the window and the door agape.
sentences.cn: 一阵风把门和窗子都吹开了.

sentences.en: Discuss why agape love is a more excellent way . ( See 12:31 ) . 4.
sentences.cn: ( 参考哥林多前书13:13 ) 3. 讨论为什么神的爱是更大的恩赐.

sentences.en: Discuss why agape love is the greatest . ( See verse 13 ). 3 .
sentences.cn: 2. 讨论为什么神的爱是最大的.

sentences.en: Everybody looks agape, also forget even timekeeper press stopwatch.
sentences.cn: 大家都看得目瞪口呆, 连计时员也忘记按下秒表了.

sentences.en: His mouth was agape in yokel fashion.
sentences.cn: 他张着口,一副土包子的样子.

sentences.en: Niebuhr thoughts that agape is theessentiality principle of human beings.
sentences.cn: 尼布尔认为爱律是人的本性法则.

sentences.en: Old Cheng who had woken was yawning . His mouth still agape he mumbled, " Is it late? "
sentences.cn: 老程醒了,打了个哈欠,口还没并好, 就手就说了话; “ 不早啦 吧 ? ” 说得音调非常的复杂.

sentences.en: She stood looking at Carmen with her mouth agape.
sentences.cn: 她站着，张大了嘴看着卡门。

sentences.en: The Children were all agape with excitement.
sentences.cn: 孩子们全兴奋得大张着嘴.

sentences.en: The relationship of agape and mutual love is dialectic.
sentences.cn: 圣爱和互爱之间存在着辩证关系.

sentences.en: The wind set the door agape.
The wind set the window agape.
Vince watched, his mouth agape in horror.
sentences.cn: 文斯注视着，吓得张大了嘴。

sentences.en: Yang stared agape at the overwhelming Covenant forces.
sentences.cn: 杨目瞪口呆地看着压倒性的圣约人军队.

trans.tran_en: with your mouth wide open, especially because you are surprised or shocked
